name: Dubstep Dubpad 2 - Electronic Music Sampler
description:
* So easy that anybody can make amazing sounding Dubstep!

* Convenient color organizing for your pads

* Super high quality sounds

Dubstep Mini DUBPAD 2 is your new electronic music mobile toy.

Enjoy creating powerful dubstep beats by simply touching the pads; supporting 11 different touches at once.

32 different sounds available; categories include: basslines, drum loops, one shots, sound fx and synths.

Enjoy!
